CustomField.description: Returns BL Quarterly Forecast for AI-Enabled opps. For Renewals, returns Renewal Net Change instead. Excludes opps where net value is 0 or less.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Eudia_Tech__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Sales_Type__c, "Renewal"), Renewal_Net_Change__c, BL_Quarterly_Forecast__c) > 0 ), IF(ISPICKVAL(Sales_Type__c, "Renewal"), Renewal_Net_Change__c, BL_Quarterly_Forecast__c), 0 )
CustomField.label: AI-Enabled Quarterly Forecast Net
